title: Bandbox Fragment, "Castle Garden", 1830–40
medium: Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support
description: With building in background, underneath the words "Castle Garden", figures stroll through garden which includes three trees, printed in green, beige and white on deep blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Bandbox Fragment, "Castle Garden", 1830–40.Block-printed on handmade paper, pasteboard support. 1982-72-1.
